I believed the $92.00 was in Canadian dollars. I did not knowingly accept to pay $92.00 american, but still had over $120.00 Canadian charged to my VISA. I would advise dealing with a more reputable source who will respond to your concerns about their products and who is actually forthcoming about the prices.

Review.Titre: I bought an SSPS program off…
Review.Contenu: I bought an SSPS program off StudentDiscounts.com. The company did not give me the license code that was required to use the program. I emailed them and received no response. He confirmed my name and email, so I thought everything was resolved. I waited 24 hours for an email and nothing was sent. I proceeded to call a second time, but it went to voicemail. I never got to use the program, which I needed for school. I disputed the charge through my bank and got a refund. I'm not pointing any fingers at anyone specifically, but something needs to be done because I not only wasted my money, I wasted my time.

They continued to charge extra to my account for my simple mistakes which they claimed "happened often." All though it is user error you should never conduct business this way. Try to help the customer and mend the relationship they have with your company! I will never shop here again and I will let every body, including my professor, know how rude the team was to me.

Review.Titre: It took 4 days to get Dl'd and then I found out what we ordered was not the correct software.
Review.Contenu: I initiated an order with [external reference] because I was told "what to do" by my university.  Kennesaw University, Kennesaw GA.   The whole process started with a letter of student registration I was told to take to the GSU bookstore.   There, I was told they do not sell the QB 2014  Academic Version. I had signed up for an online course that began more than 10 days ago.  Four days later, I was still trying unsuccessfully to acquire and DL the software I was looking for.  The class had already started and I was already "2 days late"!   There seemed to be no way to get your site to accept my "other documentation" because the university had not issued me an email address that ended in .edu. Despite multiple emails and telephone calls, no one could provide me with the Academic Version of QuickBooks Pro 2014 from [external reference].  When I finally reached someone who would work with me, I "bit the bullet"  I placed an order (that was not an Academic Version and DLd what I thought was the QB version I needed...  It turned out to be the Accountant version.... when I finally logged into my class, nothing made sense... the instructors directions did not agree with the software product I purchased from [external reference] I finally called [external reference] and ended up buying a $299+ version (non-academic) QB Pro+ and DL'd the software.... I still don't think I ended up with the subscription benefits I had anticipated from [external reference] The [external reference] rep told me to contact you for a refund... If that wouldn't work, get back in touch with them. Nevertheless, today I received this "How did we do?" email.... so, I'm telling you. The one silver lining in this (if it works out) is that when  went back to your website, I called and got in touch with one of your reps (the number given on this email was constantly busy) the person I talked to was very understanding, courteous, and professional... (I'm counting on this current assessment.)  He asked about the "boxed software" I received (which did not even open) and told me "As soon as I hang up, I will send you an email with a 'free shipping label' you can print out and tape to the boxed software to return it to us.  When we receive the box (probably within the week,) we will refund the total amount you paid us. I did not ask if there will be a "re-stocking fee" assessed... If that happens, I will take more draconian actions.... but I don't expect that to happen. When I get my refund, all will be forgiven (I'm finally online in my course and have caught up to the class,) and when I finally get an email address ending in .edu I will favorably consider returning to Student.Discount.com to do business again. Here's hoping an email will be waiting for me from your rep as soon as I post this review and follow through on his promise. I will change my rating if all goes well, but for now, one star will have to do.

Review.Titre: Order for overnight delivery came in 4 days
Review.Contenu: I needed this particular software for a school project and was working on a very tight time frame.  I selected the option for overnight delivery for an additional $44.00.  While expensive, I REALLY needed the software.  I didn't receive the order either the following day, as expected, nor by 2 pm CST on Friday.  I called the customer service number and they couldn't really explain why it hadn't shipped.  I finally got my order on Monday and was refunded the $44.00 fee for overnight shipping.

The download process required two IT specialists at my college plus a masters prepared statistician to get me started. My frustration level with this program just getting  it open to use hit maximum capacity. The senior IT person at the college had to go to a Google website to find out why the menu toolbar was not present after finally get the program downloaded and opened. This required another 90 minutes and finally success. I pity the poor people who purchase this software that don’t have the resources I did to get the fricking thing downloaded and then fixing the problem of the missing toolbar! Very unhappy customer.

Review.Titre: Not present with my transactions and questions!
Review.Contenu: I received the incorrect version of Adobe Acrobat I ordered, which then took another 12 days to send back and receive. The person I was dealing with kept asking me the same questions over that had previously been answered.  Like I said, the rep was not present with the whole experience.

The student discounted price was excellent, but the process to certify my student status was cumbersome, and unclear.  Also, I purchased on a sunday morning, but did not receive the activation codes and download link until monday.  I had an assignment due sunday night, and would have received a zero, had I not been able to get a trial version of the software elsewhere.  If you are going to have a website with 24/7 ordering, then you need to also have 24/7 responses to customers, instead of waiting a day to give them their product.

The process of receiving my disk was arduous. I ordered a disk, and it never came in the mail. When it finally did, the directions for installing it were too complicated for me to understand. Installing software shouldn't be that hard. Every time I called Student Discounts I was spoken to as if the company didn't have enough time to deal with me or answer my questions, and I was rushed off the phone each time. Overall I'm not happy, but this company was the only one providing the software for a price I could afford, so I had no choice but to use them. Disappointed and frustrated.

Review.Titre: I reached out to the "orders" email…
Review.Contenu: I reached out to the "orders" email address requesting a receipt (NOT order confirmation, but a receipt that includes the last 4 credit card digits) and never received a reply. Otherwise, everything was good.

I purchased Quickbooks a couple days ago and I'm trying to download a second copy on a different computer but I can't find where to download. I tried logging into my account but apparently I didn't make an account during the purchase and I can't use the forgot password feature?!? If this is not fixable then you should require us to create an account. Also you should add directions to your FAQ's on how to locate your second download. I have been searching my emails and nothing from your company provides this info. I'm left with calling and it's past your hours of operation. I really needed to do this tonight and I'm stuck.

Review.Titre: My program does not work properly
Review.Contenu: I recently purchase SPSS 23 and the package takes an extremely long time to open. It does not read files saved from work completed in 22 version. I am not happy with this program at all. I need a replacement copy of the software.

There was a great price on the product, but after ordering and charging my card, they emailed and said it was out of stock. They immediately refunded me, but the product should have said it was out of stock before ordering.

There's a little too much going on on the website and instructions page but not enough where you can't figure things out. The company is pretty fast.  If you are a MAC user, do not download the software! I rented SPSS and you can download it on both PC and MAC but I have a MAC. It downloaded fine but when opened it doesn't work right.  Everyone in my Master's class said the same. They all said they contacted Student Discounts and they said call IBM. IBM doesn't have answers. When I looked online, there are so many discussion boards about this problem. I don't know why they offer this for MACS if it doesn't work.  Steer clear MAC users!

Review.Titre: No one ever got back to me
Review.Contenu: No one ever got back to meTo figure out how to download product I ordered item twice Still not working

Review.Titre: Other than the price, not worth it
Review.Contenu: I ordered SPSS for my summer research project in college. Sold by the less than $100 price sticker, I was looking forward to the convenience of being able to do my statistical analyses from my own laptop. Purchasing went smoothly, but the process since then has been anything but. For over a week, I have been battling with IBM itself because the download link provided to me from [external reference] didn't work and, naturally, cannot be refunded. So at this point, I'm still in the process of getting it worked out--the authorization code also provided was invalid, causing even more of a headache. Looks like I'm out 100 bucks and still missing the software I need for my research.
Very difficult to load. Multiple students in our grad class had trouble. I spent over 2 hrs on phone with tech support. Some of tech support not friendly. Some of our stu had to go to IT to load...

Needed software for a class and ordered it through studentdiscounts. Was surprised to find that I had to send in verification that I was a student (an @edu email address wasn't good enough.) However I sent it in, but never heard back from the company and didn't receive the software. I was unable to complete a final that I was buying the software for and I wasted $70. However, after posting this review (editing now) I was contacted by customer service. After some back and forth the cost was refunded (under the condition I would edit this review.) I appreciated the refund and at least one of the customer service reps I deal with was nice (Les), but it would have been nice to get the software I needed, when I ordered it, and received a refund no questions asked once they realized the error.

Review.Titre: Paid for the data but was difficult to…
Review.Contenu: Paid for the data but was difficult to download (had windows 10 16G) and ended up using statistical software through IBM.Waste of money........................

Review.Titre: Download does not work in my computer
Review.Contenu: I bought this software  and downloaded to my computer and it's not working try multiple things and still don't work. No happy with the product

Review.Titre: Failure to download and later open the program
Review.Contenu: I downloaded the program to my computer at least 5 times, it didn't work. The program is on the computer but it won't open up.

I purchased a SPSS Grad Pack March, 2015.  SPSS was on my dedicated dissertation laptop.  However, the laptop was stolen in October 29, 2015.  Notified Students Discount of the incident.  Additionally, my plan to purchase a new laptop.  In the interim, I installed the SPSS on my desk top.  Student Discount informed me of emailing a new product key.  Emailed the key.  Discovered this was a 2nd key and terminated the key.  Following frustration, I was told I had to purchase a new SPSS.  I complied to get my data.  However, I found out that the data on the desktop computer, I could not get my work completed.  In addition, referred to support from IBM but only to discover , student has to go through a support forum.  Currently, I am experiencing problem with data unreadable when exported.  As of yet, I have not received any help from IBM !  This is very frustrating! .  Too technical with any one you speak with IBM or Student Discount.  Worst experience!  Still waiting for a response.

Review.Titre: I was never able to download the SPSS …
Review.Contenu: I was never able to download the SPSS system onto my computer. For the cost I should have been able to download without the CD.

Review.Titre: Long time between order and confirmation
Review.Contenu: It took 5 days to get my confirmation email and download info.  My class had already started and I was behind.  Completely not cool.
By the time you order, verify student status, receive and install the software you could have saved more time buying retail.
The product was good but the customer service was poor. I sent an email a month ago and still never received a response.

Review.Titre: SPSS would download but I couldn't…
Review.Contenu: SPSS would download but I couldn't activate it with the key in the email with my order.
Some anti-virus software downloaded with the product and caused computer problems.

Review.Titre: Code I received was expired & disappointed with customer service
Review.Contenu: Code I received was expired, took days to resolve the issue. Difficult to reach and help was offered but wasn't extended making me think the queue wasn't reviewed. Overall the situation was resolved by receiving a new code for a different edition of the software I ordered but was left disappointed and frustrated by the lack of expertise and follow-through from customer service.EDIT TO CLARIFY-- I received an updated code after the one originally supplied was expired. Poor review due to poor customer service. Difficult to talk to customer service, the rep I originally talked to didn't know the hours of operation for the phone service, I was able to find out after digging through the website. Frustrating that the customer service rep didn't know this and didn't offer to find out. I had been talking to a different (higher-up I assume) rep after the first rep couldn't help me with the code. We set up a session where they tried to help me with the downloading, all they did was pin the software to my task bar. Was then told to restart my computer and then it should work, it did not work. Was told that I would be moved back onto the queue and would be contacted once it was my turn, I was never reached out to again after this. The lack of follow through, lack of expertise and lack of help is the reason for the poor review. Of course, if I hadn't received an expired code I wouldn't have gone through all this but I was left disappointed with the customer service. The expired code was all IBM's issue, the poor customer service is all Student Discounts. I was able to finally get the software to work after consulting other people outside of Student Discounts and now the software works.Last update-- The second customer service rep I had (Les) was easy to work with, it seems that on the macro system the customer service division lacked.
The software delivered was for 2015 and purchased in the 4th quarter of 2016. :(
Once installed, the program will not work due to licensing issues.

Review.Titre: your website is very confusing and not …
Review.Contenu: your website is very confusing and not really user friendly.

Review.Titre: Had to call a few times to get access…
Review.Contenu: Had to call a few times to get access to my download

Review.Titre: Two emails & one phone call, a file addition,  and still non-functioning software.  not happy.
Review.Contenu: I needed this software last week.  VERY disappointed.
Rude customer service

Review.Titre: It computes very fast with multiple…
Review.Contenu: It computes very fast with multiple results coming up at the same timeHowever my program kept crashing when I tried to import an excel sheet

I was able to download - but because of the firewalls on my work computer i was not able to access all of the program components without getting IT support. (I needed IT admin permission to do anything that wasn't basic. Had to get a second computer to access the program. Very frustrating.
I like the software. I have usage for it to conduct analysis of data for policy revision.

Review.Titre: There was a cumbersome process of…
Review.Contenu: There was a cumbersome process of having to have to provide personal info (not only student ID but financial standing at the Univ...etc.) which I did not think was necessary to be able to use the software - which was asked after I already purchased. Then, there was a confusion on what is the key code vs. password. I think one terminology should be used so that the consumer can have easier experience in purchasing/accessing the program.

Only went there because in was mentionned in my course synopsis. I paid for a software and received it. Otherwise its one of the uglyest and non intuitive website ever created. Reminds me of 1996 or a store where all the goods are always on sale at 50% all year long amd the store manager calls you "my friend".

Review.Titre: While I understand its necessity I …
Review.Contenu: While I understand its necessity I think that having to jump through the hoops of proving student status was time-consuming and unnecessary. Most applications simply allow the use of a working .edu account. I also found it frustrating that there was no confirmation email that stated that my student status was approved. The multiple different direction pages were also annoying. It would have been nice to simply have the complete instructions in the email.

Review.Titre: The website and ordering process is not …
Review.Contenu: The website and ordering process is not user friendly. There’s extra clicks that aren’t necessary, just keep it simple :) Also, the website just screams at you, as a user I’m a bit overwhelmed with the information. It took me 10 mintues to find a simple button because of the information overload. Same thing with the email that was received after my purchase. Wordy and time consuming. Just give a button to verify and below it any other information you’d like to market to me.

Review.Titre: a rocky start but ended well
Review.Contenu: I bought IBM SPSS Graduate Premium package which did not come with all the product discribtion said it should. Initially I got "we can not help you" responce. Then after I wrote a complaint the company looked further into the issue and it looked like I did not receive some important pieces of softwear. The company ended up sending me what I needed in order to complete my school work.

Review.Titre: I purchased a product in 2016 with my…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a product in 2016 with my credit card and didn't have any problems. When I tried purchasing an updated version a few weeks ago, I was told that my country couldn't make purchases. Yet the country was available for selection. I had to use the StudentDiscount address to purchase the product.

There was no problem with my purchase or the service.  The service was great and quick.  However, the SPSS 22 Grad Pack download purchased with your company crashed my MacBook Pro costing me $200.00 to get it working again.  Can you explain the problem with the software download?  I still need to work with the program to complete my dissertation.

Less than a month ago I ordered spss21 standard which is valid for one year.  After download was completed including license authorization, a message appeared on my screen saying my authorization will expire in 26 days. I was shocked and very displeased. I have notified customer service about the problem and the issue is not resolved.  I am currently in the midst of data analysis for my dissertation and this situation may not yield good rating for your service

Easy to buy, complicated download process, to many steps, and annoying procedure, could have been a couple steps, but it was not.  Had to search my computer, and then manually download the program...  But good price, for what you get , as a student program.  Spss us a big rip off price normally so I guess its ok.

Don't like the new program. It uses your old program files. Not user friendly at all. Waste of money, wish I had just stayed with the old software. Download of purchase worked after several tries. I requested a hard copy and never did receive it. Not that happy with Student Discounts. Will look somewhere else next time.

I experienced some difficulty figuring out how to download the program after paying for it. Also, still not quite sure if I bought a program or just renting it... I would have preferred just buying a program online and paying some sort of amount over time until an end date for the payments.

Review.Titre: Well I appreciate the relatively fast …
Review.Contenu: Well I appreciate the relatively fast turnaround between my ordering, providing documentation, and receiving word about my purchase, i'm not so happy with the final experience. I purchased  The software Endnotes  and my "key" did not work. I was immediately referred to the manufacture. This is not a good practice I have not even opened the software yet. At the point of purchase, I should've received assistance for getting a verification  code to authorize the software.  I'm not sure I will order again

Review.Titre: Upon the purchase of each software …
Review.Contenu: Upon the purchase of each software subscription, the license codes were not immediately (or automatically) forwarded to me and only after I followed up were the codes sent in a message that said:"Here's the code:#####(License number)########"The assistance was expedient tho.

I had a question about the product because it wasn't working properly, and I sent in a detailed message to Student Discounts explaining the issue. However, I got a response that was completely unrelated to what I had asked, and I had to figure out the issue on my own. Next time please ensure that your customer service representatives take more care when it comes to such expensive packages, because we as students are very  limited on time and need all of our purchases to work properly when we purchase them. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Please fix the online download...it was problematic!
Review.Contenu: You have a great product but the download is awful..I spent $4.99 for nothing! I am happy that I also purchased the disks! The company representative could not help me solve the issue over the phone which was frustrating! But in fairness he did say that people have problems with the download. On my opinion, if so many people have problems with the download, the company has the obligation to fix it or not offer it...too frustrating for students needing the software quickly. Thanks for providing the product! Just fix the download glitches!

After purchasing the program, I was dismayed to find the basic version didn't allow access to two-way ANOVA. I think this needs to be made explicit in the program's description. This way, those who need to use two-way ANOVA can purchase the advanced version from the start.

Review.Titre: Offer was not clear that had to be a College Student instead of a Teacher to qualify to purchase!
Review.Contenu: Repeat customer and tried to purchase another SW package.  Paid for it and then was asked for more ID info.  The info earlier said if you'd purchased in the past year your ID was on records so no more needed.After completing the purchase got an email stating "need more ID info, etc."   I then got email stating SW was only available for college Student (University) and that must have college ID to qualify.   Why wasn't that in the original description or more clearly stated at the time of purchase? Not happy as was buying for an elementary teacher, not a student.

While the products work well, are relatively affordable, and easy enough to download, the ethics towards students are questionable.  I purchased a product, but later on realized it did not have all of the capabilities I needed.  So I wanted to purchase an upgraded version of the software and was hoping to get some kind of credit towards the new product.  I was told that this was not possible and would have to buy the product in full...essentially buying the same product twice.  For a company that is supposed to be helping cash strapped students, this is a very stingy way of doing business.

Review.Titre: Very difficult road to be able to use the product
Review.Contenu: I purchased SPSS and got the less expensive version only to discover that ti is not have all of the components loaded.  I wanted to upgrade and this was not possible I had to buy an additional program at another $99.   This program also did not work and I had to call the company and they have do to some kind of finagling to get it to work.  It sounded very loud like a mad scientist working and doing several things as I was put on hold multiple times.  Three weeks into my class I could finally use the software.  This was extremely frustrating and I lost money ordering a program that was not complete.

The software did not work properly for a long time after I purchased it. An IT employee at my practicum was able to get it working, but without the menu option, rendering it useless.  However, once I contacted studentdiscount.com's tech support, they said to fill in a name and institution during installation when asked to do so, which I left as the default (not blank) the first 2 times I installed it.  According to the installation instructions, the direction was to leave no field blank, it does not indicate all fields need original designations.  Now that the software has been installed correctly it is running fine.

I purchased a one-year license on a particular product only to have the license spontaneously expire before the year was up. I did not create an account when I purchased, so I had no way to prove the expiration was premature and was forced to purchase another license. Be sure to create an account that stores your order info. UPDATE (this is in response to the reply below from StudentDiscounts.com): I did indeed place an order for a 3-year license in 2011. When that expired, I placed another order for a 1-year license on September 16th, 2014 for $94.98. That license expired in May of 2015...prematurely.

I purchased the SPSS Premium GradPack. I received a licensing code promptly, but the license did not work. I tried emailing StudentDiscounts, but received no response so I emailed IBM who got it to work. Once it worked, however, I realized I did not get the version I ordered (the Base is very different from the Premium). I called StudentDiscounts and was told to call back the next day. I did and they sent another code which also did not work. The person did not know what to do so I contacted IBM again and they did get it to work. Overall, although they were somewhat helpful, I had too many issues to give them more than three stars.

The website could've been a little more user-friendly, and the fact that I had to send proof that I'm using the software for a class was a pain in the butt. Especially since I'm now having issues with the software not working.

Review.Titre: real deal, want better customer support
Review.Contenu: the product is real. however, i had some trouble with launching the version of spss i purchased on my mac. student discounts was unable to provide any customer support on this issue, leaving me without any help to figure out the matter.

Review.Titre: Issues with license expiring early ended with bonus year
Review.Contenu: I purchased a 3 year SPSS license from StudentDiscounts only to find it expired less than 1 year later. I tried multiple times over almost a week lodging the issue with various email and online chat support staff, but each time staff would tell me that they didn't have authority and needed to escalate the issue... then no one would respond! FINALLY, within hours after I posted a negative review online I received support. Coincidence or not? I'm not sure.I have now been issued with another 3 year license and (assuming it lasts its full term) get a bonus year for my trouble. While I would've preferred not to have had the wasted time and frustration, I'm grateful that the problem was able to be resolved (I hope)!

As a technology person, I have certain expectations of the process of downloading software. It seemed a bit strange to me that when I purchased the software I was sent a link to a PDF file which then provided the instructions for how to download the software and a link to the software download.I was expecting an email with a link a link to the software and further instructions so a link with a PDF to me was confusing.Also, as a first time user, I had to send my credentials as a student and it wasn't clear to me that I could download the software--there was no acknowledgement that my credentials were received, which caused a delay on my part in downloading the software.

There were a few hiccups, but I think it was due to the notices of the viruses. If you do ignore them, it shuts down the program. In any event, it did work after a while. Worth the price overall. Thank you, Serena Monzo

UPDATE: UPDATE: The people from the company contacted me directly regarding me negative review. They were very professional and concerned regarding my experience and circumstances with their company, product, and resolution. They offered to provide me with a free disk of the program purchased and promptly provided me with a full refund. They continued to follow-up to ensure I was satisfied with the resolution. I am completely satisfied with the customer service and resolution of my transaction. ORIGINAL POST:  Product did not load or work on my computer. IT guy out of the office. They say you have to pay for an additional disk. No thank you. Called my bank to get my money back.

I was misled by one of the customer service associates on the live chat. I specifically asked if the product I'm buying can be downloaded immediately after purchase and he said yes. The product didn't come with a download link and I had to talk to 3 different people on the live chat about this but no one was able to help or identify the problem. I was not even able to cancel my order and get a refund since it was after hours. Finally I received an email the next day saying my product is supposed to be shipped. Eventually I received a license key to activate it instead of waiting on the shipment. My experience would have been better if I knew the product couldn't be downloaded right away.

Originally I did not get assistance with uploading the software on my MAC I am modifying my original post as the company did contact me to assist with the upload of the software on my system so I appreciate the effort.

Review.Titre: I am satisfied with the product but not the service.
Review.Contenu: I am satisfied with the product but not the service. I had to pay twice for the base pack and then the standard grad pack not knowing that the base pack would not do the regressions and factor analysis for my course. I was in a panic for a week not understanding why I could not perform functions and then called to speak with a rep. I paid twice without complaint as I was relieved to be able to still continue with my PhD course - however I think this should be made much clearer to students. Customer service could have offered a 10% discount or a discount coupon for future purchases due to my experience, I am not seeking anything now but think this could have been handled in a better way to retain a future customer.

Review.Titre: A little more clear with instructions in the beginning
Review.Contenu: At first it was just the teacher ID. I scanned it and was ready to send it but in the email instructions I had to send a pay stub. I scanned it and sent it. I waited two days and had to call to receive the software.

Review.Titre: Great customer service but software often doesn't work
Review.Contenu: Great customer service but the doesn't work (constant crashing, despite trying many times with different versions). They are fully aware the latest version they sell doesn't work on the latest Macbook (models from 2018) yet it doesn't say that anywhere on the product page. That said the customer service is great as they do try to make things right and troubleshoot and offer a refund. So I do love that and keep coming back because of it. I should also note the software I buy from them (SPSS) is notoriously buggy so a lot of it is not their fault. But they should still tell you not to buy versions with known compatibility issues, and I've had problems with SPSS from them on previous Macbooks and previous SPSS versions.

i paid for my purchase in USD. However, as I stay in Australia and needed to claim the payment, I needed the receipt in AUD. I emailed StudentDiscounts twice requesting the same but did not hear from them.

Review.Titre: Problems? Email direct, not the chat
Review.Contenu: for some reason, spss26 would not download onto my Mac. I communicated several times with online representatives, one who gave me the worst advice of going into every folder and subfolder in the IBM program to change the permissions. And after the time-consuming act of unlocking each folder and changing the permissions in each one, (that the online rep assured me would solve the problem) it still didn't work. Unfortunately, because of attempting to solve it through the online consultants, I didn't email directly to the company until right at the beginning of the Labor Day weekend, which meant I had to wait till Tuesday to hear back from anyone. However, once I did, it was a simple return email from the company with a different link which dowloaded the app which now works perfectly.
I was supposed to get a hourly quote because I couldn't afford the package, and never received it. But, instead got an astronomical quote that I refused. After refusing it, I never got a reply back.

Review.Titre: Overall quick, but alot of extra validation
Review.Contenu: I was able to order the software and I got it pretty quickly, but there is another validtion process that you have to do before you can actually download the software....didn't really like that.

Review.Titre: In the End I DID Get the Product
Review.Contenu: Although it took some time and there was difficulty, the product did come and it does what it's supposed to. When they know they have an unsatisfied customer they definitely hurry to rectify.
not really into the poor exchange rate. What was $80.00 USD ended up bein $100.00 CAD. Also a computer science friend had to help me open SPSS on my MAC. Your instructions fell short.

Review.Titre: SSPS VERSION 22- UNABLE TO DOWNLOAD TO MY COMPUTER
Review.Contenu: I was not able to download the program to my computer, so the amount that I paid for the program is a waste of good money.  I will not recommend this program to future DNAP students.

Review.Titre: Problems but I got my software
Review.Contenu: I didn't get my download email in a timely manner.  I also purchased SPSS from them last year and it stopped working 3 months before my license expired with no way to fix it.
Download process and instructions were clear, but the file was difficult to find once downloaded. Additional instructions for initial program startup would be helpful!

The price was good and the overall experience was satisfactory.  My only frustration was that I ordered my product on Friday afternoon with the assumption that I would be able to easily verify my status as a current student and download the software (SPSS) within a few hours.  Because it was Friday, and from what I could tell nobody is available after Friday at 5 and over the weekend, I had to wait until Monday and call/email before I was able to be verified.  I have ordered from other websites that require verification and was able to download my software the same day.  I was hoping to use the software over the weekend and thought about canceling my order and going somewhere else but the website has little information and nobody available over the weekend so I was concerned I would still be stuck with the bill if I took this route.  Do not order Friday if you need the software quickly.

Review.Titre: Product and pricing good; customer service lacking!
Review.Contenu: I was furious the day I made my purchase from StudentDiscounts.com. The purchase was made. The personal forms sent and....nothing; dead silence from them. There was no confirmation email for either the sale or the documents and the phone rang off the hook for hours without so much as a beep or a automated message. I felt sick, thinking I had just been duped into handing over my personal information to a scam.I tried to cancel payment and wrote a strongly worded letter to their contact email. Within an hour they had contacted me and sent my product, which worked as promised. Though they made the excuse that they were busy that day and had to jump my order to the front of the line.I think the products and prices they offer are great but their customer service needs some serious upgading to an automated response system since they are too overloaded to properly treat there customers with the service they deserve.
Took more than a week over what I was told could be the shipping time to get the package. I haven't even installed it yet, its taken so long.

Review.Titre: Had to purchase a second licence to…
Review.Contenu: Had to purchase a second licence to install on a second computer as the computer had failed.

Review.Titre: I had to call a few times to get an …
Review.Contenu: I had to call a few times to get an issue fixed, the staff team helped pretty well but i wish i had not had the issue in the first place.

Review.Titre: it works, but took a long time
Review.Contenu: It took several attempts to get the software installed, but I am happy...now that it's over  will buy again if necessary. Great price.
Good product, but not super easy to understand what you need to do. Confirmation email of student ID verification would be better.

Review.Titre: I purchases SPSS in September 2018 with…
Review.Contenu: I purchases SPSS in September 2018 with a license for two computers. I installed on one. That computer died and when I tried to install the second copy on my new computer, it wouldn’t work. I contacted the company and was asked for the order number. I supplied the purchase receipt with the order number. The reply was the same; I was asked to provide the order number again. As a doctoral student, I needed this program to complete a course project, so I had no choice but to purchase another copy as customer service response was not effective.NOTE: Quickly after posting this review, I received a phone call from Student Discounts.  They offered to reset my subscription so I could download the second copy I had originally paid for, but was unable to access.  I had since purchased a second license and was in the middle of data evaluation, so I did not want to lose the new license and potentially any data I was working with currently.  The resolution was they refunded the cost of the second license.  I do appreciate the customer service resolution.

Review.Titre: My download didn't work, didn't receive confirmation of purchase
Review.Contenu: I didn't receive confirmation of purchase. My download was unsuccessful. They gave me the Intuitive # to call.

I purchased a 2-month subscription to SPSS as my license had just run out and I was on a tight deadline what with my honors thesis being due in under 3 weeks.  Upon attempting to run the analyses I was required to do, I realised I had accidentally purchased an insufficient version of SPSS.  As per the instructions on the website I contacted the company via their support email requesting an exchange.  I sent them two emails, two days apart, and have still heard nothing 9 days later.  As a result, I have wasted $50ish dollars on a program that is of no use to me, and had to make three 1-hour round trips to campus specifically to use their computers to run my analyses.  Will never purchase anything from StudentDiscounts again, and will warn away anyone who considers doing so.UPDATE: Less than an hour after I posted my original review, the 'head manager' of StudentDiscounts contacted me to apologise and offered to upgrade my version of SPSS to the required one free of charge.  As I told him, the crisis period has already come and gone, so having access to the program is of far less assistance than it would have been 1.5 weeks ago, but the gesture is appreciated.  I'm changing my review to a mid-way 3 stars in light of this development.  Hopefully StudentDiscounts review their turnaround times for support requests, as other than not receiving communication from them of any kind (which burdened me greatly IRL) until I left a negative review, I have no complaints about their business.

The product is working great. However, I was very disappointed with customer service. It took a few hours for me to remedy the download problem. I event so far as attempting to have Geek Squad attempt to install the program. Their assessment was that the download key was not compatible with the program, which made sense to me as the error message indicated. Two confirmations.  However, when I called StudentDiscount and told a salesperson about the problem and the recommended problem as described by Geek Squad, he would not listen to m and insisted I uninstall the program (4th or 5th time) and try a reboot. When I told him I'd performed the same procedure several times he insisted I "try". I reluctantly did with the same results. Then and only then did he submit report to their IT department. Actually, I had already contacted their IT department and got an email telling me that they would respond within 24 hours. I really wanted to get going with using the program, so that's when I used the live chat feature to dialogue with the sales person. After talking with the sales person, he sent me an email indicating that he'd filed a service report and someone would respond within the next 24 hours. Later that morning, I received a couple of emails. One indicated that problem sounded like a computer problem or something. The other, from the same source, indicated definitively that I had the "wrong product key" and posted the correct one (LOL). Full circle back to what I knew hours earlier and what the salesman did not believe. Again, great product poor customer service.
